title: 1962년 Curtin 사건
summary: 미국 Connecticut, CT 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Curtin. 판결일: 1962-10-02. 법원: Supreme Court of Connecticut.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Virginia M. Curtin v. Libman's Inc.
**판결일**: 1962-10-02
**법원**: Supreme Court of Connecticut
**관할**: Connecticut, CT

## 변호인

Seymour Framson, for the appellees (defendants)., Francis J. Connolly, Jr., with whom was Virginia M. Curtin, pro se, the appellant (plaintiff).

## 인용

- 150 Conn. 706

## 판결문 요약


Judgment shall be entered dismissing the appeal from the Superior Court in Hartford County unless, by December 3,1962, the plaintiff shall file her brief.
...
